EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform Agenda Highlights + Last Chance to Save!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=last discount&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> Register by October 21 to Save $200 Join top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the current and future impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2017.
The ticket price increases October 22, so register now <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-highlights-q317]]>.
Get your head in the cloud with us!
